enchantment.whooshwhoosh.apotheosis.desc: Elevates all enchantments on the item to their maximum level
enchantment.whooshwhoosh.finisher.desc: Instantly slays enemies with low health when attacked
enchantment.whooshwhoosh.offering.desc: Makes the item very fragile and drops experience when it breaks
enchantment.whooshwhoosh.symbiosis.desc: Mutually shares durability among items in the inventory that have this enchantment
enchantment.whooshwhoosh.envenom.desc: Applies poison to targets for several seconds when attacking
enchantment.whooshwhoosh.catalysis.desc: When attacking, raises the level of existing effects on targets by 1 and reduces their duration
enchantment.whooshwhoosh.weaken_strike.d: When attacking, has a chance to apply the weakness effect to enemies
enchantment.whooshwhoosh.bone_shatter.de: When landing a critical hit, applies Weakness, Slowness, and Mining Fatigue effects to the target
